utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So ah, your first sexual experience was with a woman?!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: All right, I was 15, it was my best friend, Ruth, and we got drunk on that hard cider, and then suddenly, I don’t know, we were, we were making out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Tell it again. Seriously.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean is that woman capable of talking about anything else but sex?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, sure. Well y'know, earlier she was talking about geography.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, she was listing the countries she’s done it in.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I think we all learned something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, you guys! Look what I found! Look at this! That’s my Mom’s writing! Look.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Me and Frank and Phoebe, Graduation 1965.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know what that means?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That you’re actually 50?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-no, that’s not, that’s not me Phoebe, that’s her pal Phoebe. According to her high school yearbook, they were like B.F.F. Best Friends Forever.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is so cool.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know! So this woman probably could like have all kinds of stories about my parents, and she might even know like where my Dad is. So I looked her up, and she lives out by the beach. So maybe this weekend we could go to the beach?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah, we can!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Shoot! I can’t go, I have to work!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s too bad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, big, fat bummerrr.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So great! Okay! Tomorrow we’re gonna drive out to Montauk.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Bonnie had sex there!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Would you look at them. Am I ever gonna find a boyfriend again? I gonna die an old maid.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re not gonna die an old maid, maybe an old spinster cook.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey now besides, if worst comes to worst, I’ll be your boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why is that so funny?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You made a joke right? So I laughed.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ha-ha-ha. A little to hard. What am I not ah, boyfriend material?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, no. You’re Chandler. Y'know, Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so we’ve established my name, and hit me. But theoretically y'know, I mean say we weren’t friends, say it’s a blind date. I show up at your door, and I’m like “Hey, nice to meet, ya. Hey, oh-hey.”

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well I’d probably be scared of a guy using a fake voice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, hey! Oh good, you brought food!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, it’s just my luggage.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Woo-hoo! All right! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I am having the best karma this week. First, I find this woman who knew my parents, and then my client with the fuzzy back gives me his beach house.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? What about ah, that bike messenger you hit?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I wasn’t talking about his karma.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey, check out the hat!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What a minute, I know that hat! I was taken aboard that hat! They did experiments on me! I can’t have children!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Seriously, where did you get the hat?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross gave it to me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I think she looks good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Buy it for ya, or win it for ya?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well excuse me, my fashion-impaired friends, I am here to tell you that hats are back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And this time, they’ve ganged up to form one giant, super hat.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Go, go, go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah, now everybody wants to be under this hat!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oy!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s with all this sand?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, Bob said there might be flood damage.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, either that, or he has a really big cat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Well, yes, it’s kind’ve an unusual house. It has umm, three beautiful bedrooms and ah, no baths. But y'know, the ocean is right there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Knock, knock, knock.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Ah, oh, hang on a second. Come in, come in. All right, so think about it, and call me back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you ah, Phoebe Abott?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Ahh, yes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi Phoebe Abott, I’m your best friends daughter!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: You’re Erwin’s daughter?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I-I mean your-your old best friend, here. Lily, from high school. Remember?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Oh gosh, Lily, yes. Of course I remember Lily. I... Then you must be?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Phoebe. Phoebe. Phoebe, yeah. She named me after you I guess.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Wow! Well, look! There’s Frank.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes!! Yes! Yes! Yes!! That’s my Dad, that’s Frank! Yeah! I’m sorry I’m getting all flingy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Take it easy--if you want, there’s cookies on the counter, or, or--sangria! I can make sangria!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-no, sorry. Cookies are good, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, so, umm, anyway umm, I’ve been, I’ve been looking for my Father, and umm, have you heard from him, or seen him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Oh no, I-I’m sorry, I guess we lost track of everybody after high school.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Well, so tell me everything about my parents. Everything.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Ohh, well. Y'know we were always together, in fact the had a nickname for the three of us.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, what? What was it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: The three losers. Oh, poor Lily. Ohh, y'know I-I heard about what happened, that must have been just terrible for you, losing your mother that way.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, no, it was great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, y'know what a really good rainy day game is?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I mean naked game. Strip poker, we should totally play strip poker.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: No, no!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you crazy?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on! When you go away, you-you have to play, it’s like a law!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Allll done!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Aww, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, who’s next?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-o-o! No way!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on, please?! I’m boredddd! You let me do it once before.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah well, if ah, if that’s the rule this weekend... No!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Get away!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just once!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Stay away!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Take it like a man, Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Big bullies!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ow! Ow! Oh, no-no-no!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, so, how are we doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bored and bored!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you know what naked card game is never boring?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Noo!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So what’s Phoebe like?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m kind, caring, and sweet. What’s Monica like?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ah no, the other Phoebe, the one you went to go see.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, I think she knows where my Dad is.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh well, where is he?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She was acting, she was pretending like she hasn’t heard from him on years, but I found this picture on her fridge, and look ! Isn’t this what he would look like now?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Totally familiar.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yeah.

utterance.speaker: The Guys
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, why would she lie to you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know, but we’re having dinner tomorrow night, so I figured, she’s gonna tell me then. Y'know maybe she just wanted to give him time to, buy me presents, I don’t know! So, you’re all bored?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Ohh!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I’m gonna close my eyes and point to someone, and you, whoever I point has to come up with something fun for us to do, and we have to do it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, all right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fan out! Fan out!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Ooh, y'know we could just do this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, umm, we all have to play strip poker.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: OH YES!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Strip Happy Days Game?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, well, I couldn’t find any cards, so it was either this or Strip Bag Of Old Knitting Stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, Fonzy gives you two thumbs up, collect two cool points. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica, if you get five cool points, you get to make somebody take off one item of clothing. It hasn’t happened yet, but we’re all very excited.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, come on! Daddy needs a new pair of electromagnetic microscopes for the Prehistoric Forensics Department! Okay. Take Pinky Tuscadero up to Inspiration Point, collect three cool points!! Yeah! Which gives me five, and let’s see who is gonna lose their clothes. Ummmm, I think I pick our strip poker sponsor Mr. Joey Tribianni.

utterance.speaker: The Girls
utterance.content: Woo-hooooo!!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, relax. It’s just a shoe.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Wooooo!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, your band is playing at Arnold’s, collect three cool points. Which means, I have five, and that means I get Joey’s boxers!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine. Gang up on me! I got you all right where I want you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on, take ‘em off!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Actually, y'know it’s kinda cold, so how about I keep my boxers on, and give you all a peek at the good stuff?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, I’m gonna make more margaritas!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Whoa, hey! What are doing? Trying to get me drunk?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m just making margaritas.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think I’ll help her out. What is going on here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You painting his toenails?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chasing him all around the room?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He’s totally flirting with you too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He is, isn’t he? I don’t know, I don’t know, I mean maybe it’s just being here at the beach together or, I don’t know. But it’s like something...

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Hi Bonnie!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Hi! My boss let me off early, so I took the train.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: What are you guys doing?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’re playing Strip Happy Days Game!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Cool! I’ll catch up!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, you still don’t think I’m boyfriend material?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I saw you checking me out during the game last night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You didn’t even take off your pants.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well, lucky for you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well! Is everybody else having just the best time?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Shhh! Shhhh! Joey’s asleep.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: After he passed out, we put the sand around him to keep him warm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well I assume the ah, happy couple isn’t up yet. Did you guys hear them last night?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, I don’t know what they were doing, but at one point sea turtles actually came up to the house.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good morning.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Hey! How did everybody sleep?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Like a log.

utterance.speaker: Ross and Bonnie
utterance.content: Us too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m going for a walk.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good morning. Nice breasts by the way.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Hey, what happened to you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, ah nothin’. I just felt like hangin’ out here and reading.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Oh, the water was sooo great! We jumped off this pier and my suit came off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhhh, sorry I missed that.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Yeah, Joey and Chandler sure are funny.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh-ha-ha!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: I think I brought back half of the beach in my hair. It was so much easier when I used to shave my head.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know, I gotta tell ya, I just loved your look when you were bald.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Because I think about shaving it all off again sometime.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean you definitely should do that.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Y'know what, I should do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Yeah, thank you Rachel, you are soo cool.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Awww, stop. Come on. Now go shave that head!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What’s the matter, Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She cancelled! My namesake cancelled on me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, she clamed she had to go out of town suddenly. She’s avoiding me, she doesn’t want to tell me where my Father is. She knows, and she won’t tell me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aww Pheebs, that sucks!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, well, don’t “Aww Pheebs, that sucks!” me yet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where ya going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, she’s out of town so, there’s gotta be something in her house that tells me where my Father is.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, Pheebs, some people call that breaking and entering.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, are any of those people here?!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh, no!! No, no!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, look I-I-I do something nice, okay? I’ll-I’ll fill her ice trays.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Hey, everybody!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Wow!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wh-haa-haa! Look what ‘cha did!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: You wanna touch it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nooo, but it, but it’s great.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Come on, touch it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. You can feel all the bones in your skull.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was having a little chat with ah, Bonnie, and ah, guess what, she-she happened to bring up y'know, who was behind the um, whole head shaving idea, and now, who was it? Oh, that’s right, that’s right, it was you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That was her idea, I just gave her a nudge.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She said you gave her the razor!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Hey guys.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: So, anyone up for a midnight dip in the ocean?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ahh, no, I’m good.

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Okay, I’ll see you in a bit.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, have fun! Wooo!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on see, she doesn’t look that bad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You can see the moonlight bouncing off her head! What the hell were you thinking?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You don’t know?! Rach, you balded my girlfriend!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right! Ross, do you think it’s easy for me to see you with somebody else?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know, hey! You’re the one who ended it, remember?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, because I was mad at you, not because I stopped loving you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You still love me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You still love me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, y-yeah, so, you-you love me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Noo, nnnnn. What does this mean? What do you, I mean do you wanna, get back together?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo! Maybe! I, I don’t know. Ross, I still can’t forgive you for what you did, I can’t, I just, but sometimes when I’m with you I just, I feel so...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just, I feel, I-I just...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I feel...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Noo!! I don’t care! I’m not, I’m not gonna playing one-on-one strip poker with you for practice!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But I made cards!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well! Good night. I’m going upstairs.

utterance.speaker: Joey and Chandler
utterance.content: G’night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wanna play strip poker for practice?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ow! My ass. Okay. Okay. Oh, shhh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No!! It’s me! It’s me! I-I didn’t want to make any noise!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Then don't break in!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: What are you doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I-I, came to fill your ice cube trays.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, okay, okay, look. I took this picture from your fridge. Okay, because I know that this is my Father. Yeah, this is Frank Buffay and you are standing right there next to him. Now, look I deserve to know where I came from. All right? So if you can help me find my Father then you should! Otherwise, you’re just mean! So, just tell me the truth!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: All right, the man in the picture is Chuck Magioni.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My Father is Chuck Magioni?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: No, no, that’s just Chuck Magioni, I-I sold him a house last year! And I’m very sorry, but I don’t know where your Father is, and that’s the truth.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: But umm, you’re right. I think that a person should know where they come from. Wh-which is why I ah, ahh, okay. I’m your mother.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Heh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe Sr
utterance.content: Y'know I wanted to tell you yesterday, but I just, I kinda felt all floopy, and...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m telling ya, you guys are totally getting back together!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s not true! Her, she doesn’t even know what she wants! Rachel’s still mad about the whole thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, then you gotta back away, all right? You don’t need that kind’ve hurt. Take it from a guy who’s never had a long term relationship......

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, but ahhhhhh!! I really wanna go up there and finish that kiss!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahhhh!

utterance.speaker: Bonnie
utterance.content: You guys, the water’s great. You should really go in.
